description: 4 letter code uniquely identifying single species / 12 letter code uniquely identifying a mixture
bulk density of the litter bed measured as the average of 6 points
ignitability, measured as the # of seconds it takes for steady flame
sustainability, measured as the # of seconds it takes flame to travel through the bed
spread rate, measured by dividing the length of the bed by sustainability
combustability, measured as height of the tallest flame
number of seconds temperature was above 100 °C, at the middle of the table (75 cm), at the bottom
True/False statement determining whether spcode corresponds to a mixture
